name: vador-spring
description: hal client for spring data rest with hateoas

scripts.build:browser: browserify src/index.js --standalone vadorSpring -t babelify -t  [ envify --TYPE_BUILD noYaku ] -t [ uglifyify --ignore '**/{core,restClient}/*' ]> build/browser/vadorSpring.js
scripts.build:browser:min: browserify src/index.js -g uglifyify --standalone vadorSpring -t babelify -t  [ envify --TYPE_BUILD noYaku ] -t > build/browser/vadorSpring.min.js
scripts.build:yaku:browser: browserify src/index.js --standalone vadorSpring -t babelify -t  [ envify --TYPE_BUILD yaku ] -t [ uglifyify --ignore '**/{core,restClient}/*' ]> build/browser/vadorSpring.yaku.js
scripts.build:yaku:browser:min: browserify src/index.js -g uglifyify --standalone vadorSpring -t babelify -t  [ envify --TYPE_BUILD yaku ] > build/browser/vadorSpring.yaku.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser && npm run build:browser:min && npm run build:yaku:browser && npm run build:yaku:browser:min
